articles.title: Lidl Ireland fans rushing to buy children's outfits for summer in middle aisle from just €2 – and there's three options
articles.author: Isabela Boechat
articles.summary: Lidl Ireland has introduced new children's outfits starting from €2, including t-shirts and shorts in sizes two to eight years old. Pyjamas for boys are also available from April 24 for €3. Additionally, Lidl is offering a discounted Rotary Clothes Airer for €19.99, originally priced at €29.99.

articles.title: Turning into a prepper? You need this flashlight 2-pack for under $30
articles.author: Stack Commerce
articles.summary: The FlashMini PRO utility flashlight, now available in a two-pack for $29.99, features 800 lumens brightness, 12 utility functions including a bottle opener, and seven light modes with an emergency strobe. It's water and dustproof, with a battery lasting up to 3.5 hours, and includes a carabiner, magnetic base, kickstand, and universal tripod mount.

articles.title: My Favorite Amazon Deal of the Day: The Kindle Colorsoft Signature Edition
articles.author: Daniel Oropeza
articles.summary: Amazon launched the Kindle Colorsoft Signature Edition e-reader in November, featuring a color display. The device is currently on sale for $224.99, its lowest price since release. Customers can also receive three months of free Kindle Unlimited with purchase.

articles.title: Non-techies in Bengaluru are vibe coding, thanks to AI
articles.author: Barkha Kumari
articles.summary: Cursor, Replit, Windsurf, Bolt, and Lovable are platforms that allow users to generate code using plain-English prompts such as 'Make me XYZ with ABC features.' These platforms streamline the coding process.

articles.title: I used to hate curved phone screens, but now I find myself missing them
articles.author: John Kanellakos
articles.summary: Samsung initially introduced curved display panels in smartphones with models like the Galaxy Note Edge and Galaxy S6 Edge. Recently, companies like OnePlus with the OnePlus 13 and Motorola with the Edge 60 Pro, are reintroducing curved screens, indicating a potential resurgence of the design trend with a quad-curved approach.

articles.title: Genesis could tackle Defender with luxury off-roader
articles.author: William Stopford
articles.summary: Genesis, a Korean luxury brand, is expanding its product line beyond sedans. Genesis might launch new SUV models, including one based on its latest concept car.

articles.title: UPDATE -- Rezolve Ai Smashes Past $50 Billion in GMV in Explosive Start to 2025, Over 50 Major Enterprises Now Live and Scaling  Apr. 24, 2025 21:41
articles.summary: Rezolve Ai's platform is now powering billions in commerce for household-name retailers, delivering massive value to retailers, measurable returns, and scaling at a pace that redefines industry expectations. Rezolve Ai secured a $9.8 million annual contract with Liverpool Mexico and expects to achieve its $100 million estimated ARR target by year-end.

articles.title: Meta Updates Dynamic Labels for Advantage+ Catalog Ads
articles.author: Andrew Hutchinson
articles.summary: Meta is updating its Advantage+ Catalog campaigns by introducing 'dynamic overlays' to catalog ads on Facebook feed. These overlays display price, discounts, and free shipping information as stickers on the product image. Advertisers can choose to apply overlays automatically or customize them, with the ability to toggle different label types individually.

articles.title: Web.com is becoming Network Solutions
articles.author: Web Hosting Talk
articles.summary: Newfold is discontinuing the Web.com brand. Newfold is migrating Web.com customer accounts to Network Solutions.

articles.title: Nexxen Advances AI Capabilities, Launches ‘nexAI'  Apr. 24, 2025 21:00
articles.summary: Nexxen has launched nexAI, a comprehensive suite of AI-powered assistants and features integrated across its advertising technology platform. The initial offering includes an in-platform assistant for the Nexxen DSP, designed to streamline workflows and enhance campaign performance. Future releases promise optimization recommendations to improve return-on-ad-spend.

articles.title: Crashes, Chaos Greet Gamers Eager for Nintendo Switch 2
articles.author: Arden Dier
articles.summary: Nintendo's upcoming new gaming console, the Nintendo Switch 2, triggered massive outages at retail store websites early Thursday as pre-orders sold out within minutes. The official launch date is set for June 5 in the US and Canada after a delay of several weeks. The company welcomed pre-orders beginning at midnight ET Thursday.

articles.title: The XL Dyson Gen5outsize Absolute cordless vacuum is on sale, but only for a limited time
articles.author: Josie Howell
articles.summary: Dyson has announced new online deals, including a $150 discount on the Dyson Gen5outsize Absolute cordless vacuum. The Gen5outsize Absolute features an extra-large dirt bin, a runtime of 140 minutes, and an illuminating green light for revealing dirt and dust, and is now available for $899.99.

articles.title: I tried all the supermarket Pot Noodles – £1 winner looks VERY bland but is tasty, filling and impressive for the price
articles.author: Thea Jacobs
articles.summary: Thea Jacobs reviewed and rated various instant noodle products available in supermarkets. These products include Batchelors Super Noodles, Newgate Express Speedy Noodle, Naked Noodles, Just Essentials Cup Noodle, Bramwells Express Snack Noodles, Itsu Chick-n Ramen Rice Noodles, Pot Noodle, Bramwells Express Soba Noodles, Nissin Cup Noodles Instant Ramen, and Kabuto Noodles Chicken Ramen. The reviews assess the taste, texture, value, and overall quality of each noodle product.

articles.title: NGX lists Legend Internet as market capitalisation rises by N12.4bn
articles.author: Temitope Aina
articles.summary: Legend Internet Service PLC, an internet service provider, listed on the Nigerian Exchange Limited (NGX) with 2,000,000,000 ordinary shares. The listing signifies the company's commitment to expanding in new technologies, deepening infrastructure, and reaching more underserved communities with premium digital services.

articles.title: Do you say 'please' and 'thank you' to ChatGPT?
articles.author: Craig Donaldson
articles.summary: Roku introduced a new Streaming Stick and Streaming Stick Plus.

articles.title: Las Vegas residents line up overnight for ALDI grand opening
articles.author: JC Fernandez
articles.summary: ALDI opened a new store in Henderson, Nevada, on April 24, offering a streamlined grocery shopping experience. The first 100 customers received gift bags with ALDI-exclusive products and gift cards. Additional ALDI stores are planned to open in the area.

articles.title: Samsung Ads Launches Creative Canvas In-House Interactive Ad Format
articles.author: Mark K. Miller
articles.summary: Samsung Ads, a division of Samsung Electronics, launched Creative Canvas, a new interactive advertising format designed to enhance consumer engagement. This one-stop-shop solution enables advertisers to develop actionable ads, featuring QR code integration and vertical video support. It offers advanced measurement tools and campaign performance reporting.

articles.title: Introducing Daia 3-in-1 Softergent Lavender: Neelofa loves how it keeps clothes fresh, soft, and clean--without additional softener or luxury perfume
articles.summary: Gentle Supreme Sdn. Bhd. has launched Daia 3-in-1 Softergent Lavender in Malaysia. This new laundry solution combines cleaning, softening, and antibacterial protection with a lavender fragrance into a single product and is available in both liquid and powder formats.

articles.title: Aldi brings back viral Dyson Dupe hairstyler that's 5 tools in 1 & £183 cheaper than other brands
articles.author: Claudia Jackson
articles.summary: Aldi is launching several new beauty products on May 1st, including a 5-in-1 Hair Styler for £59.99, a Brushless Motor Hairdryer for £29.99, a Pore Remover for £9.99, Manicure and Pedicure Sets for £12.99 each, and a Cordless Epilator for £14.99. The 5-in-1 Hair Styler has five attachments and features ionic technology, while the Brushless Motor Hairdryer has three speeds and three temperatures.

articles.title: Is your scalp dry? Dermatologists recommend these 6 shampoos, plus editor favorites
articles.author: Jannely Espinal
articles.summary: The article recommends various shampoos for dry scalps, including CeraVe shampoo with pyrithione zinc and hyaluronic acid, and a formula with mint essential oil. Ouai's dandruff shampoo is also highlighted for effectively reducing flakes and having a pleasant scent. These are available in different sizes and contain multiple active ingredients for sensitive, dry scalps.

articles.title: Victoria's Secret's £35 swimsuit could easily be mistaken for £175 designer Hunza G
articles.author: Lauren Codling
articles.summary: Victoria's Secret has launched a new crinkle swimsuit range, offering a more affordable alternative to designer brands like Hunza G. The collection includes bikini tops, bottoms, and one-piece swimsuits in various styles and colors. The "Dream On" bikini duo is priced at £101, while the one-piece costs £35.

articles.title: Adobe's Firefly AI art tools now mash up images into something new
articles.author: Mark Hachman
articles.summary: Adobe has launched its text-to-video capabilities within its Firefly generative AI service, making the service generally available on the web. This launch is part of Adobe's broader strategy to evolve Firefly into a front-end service for generative AI. The Firefly service initially debuted in beta in 2023 as an image and font generator.

articles.title: Nintendo Switch 2 preorders go live, with limited stock: Where to get it
articles.author: Poughkeepsie Journal
articles.summary: Nintendo plans to release the Switch 2, successor to the Nintendo Switch console, in 2025. The Nintendo Switch 2 full release is scheduled for June 5. Nintendo plans to continue producing and shipping a considerable number of Switch 2 units in the future.

articles.title: Aldi is selling a dupe of the viral Kylie Jenner $22 lip kit for just $3 – and fans say it's ‘gorgeous'
articles.author: Jacob Willeford
articles.summary: Aldi is launching new products under its Lacura beauty and skincare line, including the Lacura Lip Kit ($3), Overnight Lip Masks ($5.49), and Liquid Blush ($4.99). Aldi is also offering affordable gardening gadgets, such as a 20-Volt Cordless Blower ($39.99), a hose nozzle ($8.99) and a pressure washer ($70), as part of Aldi Finds.

articles.title: Motorola announces next-gen motorola razr family in North America, introducing ai-powered flip phones across three tiers
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Motorola is launching the new Razr Ultra, Razr+, and Razr smartphones. These devices offer smarter experiences, iconic design, performance, and camera upgrades, all intended to create a complete ecosystem experience for users.

articles.title: 11 Tatcha Products That Will Earn A Permanent Spot On Your Vanity
articles.author: Isabella Sarlija
articles.summary: Tatcha introduces a range of new skincare products including The Water Cream, The Rice Wash, The Essence, The Violet-C Radiance Mask, The Silk Serum, The Kissu Lip Mask, The Silk Canvas, The Rice Polish, The Silk Powder, The Luminous Dewy Skin Mist and The Brightening Eye Cream. These products are designed to hydrate, exfoliate, brighten, and protect the skin, incorporating ingredients like glycerin, hyaluronic acid, vitamin C, and silk extracts.

articles.title: Rubbermaid's scrubber, down to a rare $15, is 'like an electric toothbrush' for your home
articles.summary: The Rubbermaid Reveal Power Scrubber is a handheld cleaning gadget designed for cleaning tight corners and other small spaces. It is powered by 6 volts and oscillates 60 times per second, cleaning faster than a standard brush. Customer reviews highlight its effectiveness in cleaning grout and other difficult areas.

articles.title: Samsung unveils Galaxy Z Flip 7 and Z Fold 7 in July with cutting-edge tech and refined design
articles.author: Redação Portal
articles.summary: Samsung is preparing to launch several new products, including the Galaxy Z Flip 7, Galaxy Z Fold 7, the budget-friendly Galaxy Z Flip 7 FE, and a new tri-fold smartphone in New York City. The Galaxy Z Flip 7 will feature a larger 4-inch external display and a 4,300 mAh battery, while the Galaxy Z Fold 7 may boast a 200 MP main camera and a slimmer design.

articles.title: Missed the Nintendo Switch 2 pre-order? We found the original for less than $280
articles.author: David Hoffman
articles.summary: Nintendo launched the new Nintendo Switch 2. Pre-orders were available at Walmart, Target, GameStop, and Newegg. The official release date is scheduled for Thursday, June 5. The original Nintendo Switch is also currently on sale at Amazon.

articles.title: Motorola razr reboot: Iconic style, moto ai smarts - and Verizon-exclusive savings
articles.summary: Verizon is launching the new Motorola Razr, featuring moto ai, with orders starting May 15th. The phone will be available in PANTONE Gibraltar Sea, Spring Bud, and Parfait Pink for $16.67/month for 36 months, or customers can get it for free by trading in their current smartphone on myPlan with a three-year price lock.

articles.title: Motorola expands its Edge 60 series with two new phones colored by Pantone.
articles.author: Andrew Liszewski
articles.summary: Motorola is launching two new smartphones, the Edge 60 Pro and the Edge 60, in the UK and other countries. The Edge 60 Pro is priced at £599.99 and features a textured finish in three Pantone-curated colors. The Edge 60 is priced at £379.99 and has canvas and leather-inspired textures in Gibraltar sea and shamrock colors.

articles.title: WhatsApp has added a new AI feature and you can't get rid of it
articles.author: Rob Waugh
articles.summary: WhatsApp has introduced a new, optional AI chatbot feature called Meta AI within its app, accessible via a blue circle icon.  Meta AI is powered by a Large Language Model and allows users to ask questions, get suggestions, and engage in conversations. Advanced Chat Privacy feature is introduced to offer additional control over data shared from chats.

articles.title: Hundreds waited in line for the grand opening of the new Wawa in Pooler
articles.author: Richard Burkhart
articles.summary: Wawa celebrated the grand opening of its new store in Pooler on April 24, 2025. Customers were greeted by the Wawa mascot, and the event included performances by local high school cheerleaders and marching bands. A $2,000 donation was also made to the Children's Hospital of Georgia.

articles.title: Tuya Smart Unveils Four Core AIoT Technology Engines, Empowering Developers to Reconstruct the Physical World with AI  Apr. 24, 2025 15:32
articles.summary: Tuya Smart launched four new platforms at the TUYA Global Developer Summit: the AI Agent Development Platform, Tuya.AI, TuyaOpen, and HEDV. These platforms offer developers tools for AIoT development, focusing on AI integration, open-source capabilities, and edge computing solutions to accelerate the commercialization of AIoT technologies.

articles.title: Fake models for fast fashion? What AI clones mean for our jobs — and our identities
articles.author: Jul Parke
articles.summary: H&M has introduced a new AI venture, cloning 30 real-life models using 'digital twin' technology.  This immersive shopping experience allows shoppers to create social media content. The company states that the human models will receive 'fair compensation,' including continued payment for the use of their digital replicas beyond initial creation.

articles.title: MG Cyber X concept unveiled with pop-up headlights
articles.author: Derek Fung
articles.summary: MG revealed the Cyber X concept car, potentially previewing a future production model. The Cyber X is aimed at enthusiasts and features a unique squared-off design. It may utilize MG's new E3 plug-in hybrid and EV platform and incorporate cabin technology developed by Oppo.

articles.title: Gopuff and Koddi Launch Incremental Ad Measurement Tool
articles.author: Koddi Inc
articles.summary: Koddi partnered with Gopuff to launch new incrementality tools for Gopuff Ads platform. These tools enable advertisers to measure the incremental impact of their campaigns, with pilot programs showing a 40% average increase in incremental purchases per user. The new measurement tools allow advertisers to quantify incremental sales on Gopuff.

articles.title: Is Google Losing to TikTok, Insta, & ChatGPT?
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: HubSpot utilizes AI to personalize marketing campaigns and improve customer engagement. The article also emphasizes the importance of implementing AI-powered chatbots for customer service and personalized recommendations. Sephora and L'Oréal also reported significant gains from social commerce strategies on TikTok, with an increase of 30% of their organic traffic.

articles.title: You don't need a bar — just this chef-recommended $90 blender and a lime
articles.author: Kendall Cornish
articles.summary: Ninja introduces the Professional Plus Blender, highlighting its 1400-peak-watt motor, 72-ounce pitcher, and pre-set programs for smoothies, ice cream, and frozen drinks. The blender is currently on sale on Amazon for $89.99 and features Auto-iQ tech.

articles.title: LG pushes a game-changing update to its TV lineup
articles.author: Craig Donaldson
articles.summary: LG has launched the Xbox app on select LG smart TVs in 25 countries including the US, UK, and Canada. Users can stream Xbox games directly on their TVs through Xbox Game Pass with a compatible controller, eliminating the need for a console. This app is available via the LG Gaming Portal on LG TVs from 2022 or newer.

articles.title: Nexxen Advances AI Capabilities, Launches ‘nexAI'
articles.author: Mark K. Miller
articles.summary: Nexxen introduced nexAI, a suite of AI-powered agents and features integrated across its advertising technology platform to elevate the advertising lifecycle. The first generative AI advancement includes a chatbot agent integrated into Nexxen DSP to streamline workflows and improve campaign performance.

articles.title: Canon launches cinema grade camera,  EOS R50 V, for creators: Specs, price and first impressions
articles.author: Dhruv Mohan
articles.summary: Canon is launching the EOS R50 V camera, designed for video-centric content creators, on April 28 in India. This new 'V' series camera builds on the original R50 with tweaks for prioritizing video, featuring a dedicated video mode dial, one-touch livestreaming controls, and a new RF-S 14-30mm F4-6.3 IS STM PZ lens with built-in power zoom.

articles.title: Samsung says its ‘Screens Everywhere' approach won't mean ads everywhere, for now
articles.author: Jennifer Pattison Tuohy
articles.summary: Samsung has launched new products featuring 'AI Home screens' as part of its 'Screens Everywhere' initiative. These include the Bespoke AI Home washer and dryer and a new model of the Family Hub smart fridge (Bespoke Four Door French Door with AI Home). The AI Home screens are Android tablets embedded in appliances, offering control of the appliance, ability to run apps like SmartThings and Samsung Food and function as SmartThings Hubs.

articles.title: Bill Gates' Youngest Daughter Makes Big Announcement
articles.summary: Phoebe Gates and Sophia Kianni launched Phia, a new AI-powered shopping app that compares prices across numerous retail and secondhand sites, aiming to simplify and optimize the fashion shopping experience for users. Phia is designed to help customers find the best deals effortlessly.

articles.title: Startek® Generative AI wins 2025 Excellence in Customer Service Award for Technology of the Year
articles.summary: Startek's Generative AI platform won the Technology of the Year award for its innovation in customer service. The platform enhances real-time interactions with intelligent automation and predictive insights. The platform aims to improve resolution speed, personalization, and customer satisfaction.

articles.title: Nintendo Switch 2 buyers face anxious wait as release date of huge sports game leaks
articles.author: Lloyd Coombes
articles.summary: EA is promising more support for the Nintendo Switch 2 with its flagship sports titles, including Madden. This suggests improved features and integration compared to the original Nintendo Switch.

articles.title: MG Cyber X concept unveiled with pop-up headlights
articles.author: Derek Fung
articles.summary: MG revealed the Cyber X concept at the 2025 Shanghai motor show, previewing a likely production model for the following year. Car News China reports the production version of the Cyber X will be launched in 2026. The cabin technology in the concept car was developed by Oppo.

articles.title: New visual identity for salad brand
articles.summary: Fresh Express is launching a refreshed brand identity, including a modernized logo and redesigned packaging. This launch, starting May 9, 2025, aims to connect with a new generation of salad lovers and enhance the brand's shelf presence. The company is also launching the "Express Yourself" campaign to promote creativity with their salads.

articles.title: Bozeman LLC Launches New Camping Gear Brand 'Bozeman Outdoors' with Debut Product: The Bozeman Camping Pillow
articles.summary: Bozeman LLC has launched a new brand, Bozeman Outdoors, specializing in camping gear, and has released the Bozeman Camping Pillow 2-Pack, now available on Amazon. The pillow features premium shredded memory foam, a washable cover, and includes a sleeping mask and earplugs. More product releases are planned for 2025.

articles.title: 27 Pieces Of Clothing That Guarantee A Minimum Of 1,000 Compliments
articles.author: Buzz Feed Contributor
articles.summary: Amazon, Cider, and House of CB are offering a wide range of new clothing items. These include dresses, jumpsuits, jeans, skirts, swimwear, leggings, tops, and blazers in various styles, sizes, and colors. Prices range from approximately $15 to $89.

articles.title: Vacant Giant grocery store in Lyon Village might become a Sprouts
articles.author: Katie Taranto
articles.summary: Sprouts Farmers Market is planning to launch a new grocery store at 3115 Langston Blvd, in the vacant Giant location in Lyon Village Shopping Center. The permit application has been filed for tenant improvement and the store will focus on fresh produce and organic goods.

articles.title: Pinkberry's summer swirl: Frozen yogurt steps into the spotlight
articles.summary: Pinkberry has introduced Pinkberry Pops, handheld frozen yogurt treats, along with new summer flavors like Mango and Vegan Chocolate. Pinkberry also launched a mobile app, Pinkberry PH, to reward customers with points for purchases, redeemable for free items and exclusive promotions.

articles.title: DeepSeek opens roles for ‘product and design' as start-up keeps mum on new AI model
articles.author: Xinmei Shen
articles.summary: DeepSeek has begun recruiting for product and design roles in Beijing and Hangzhou to develop a 'next-generation intelligent product experience' based on large language model technology. This initiative suggests DeepSeek is working on launching or introducing a new AI product or service, building upon its existing work, including releasing updates to its open-source V3 model.

articles.title: Wendy's makes history in Romania, with a cultural tribute and logo redesign for a new market
articles.author: Mihai-Alexandru Cristea
articles.summary: Wendy's launched its restaurant in Romania at Mega Mall Bucharest on April 24th with a launch celebration. Wendy's introduced a limited-edition Romanian-themed logo for the launch. The Romanian Wendy's uses 100% fresh, Romanian beef and whole breast chicken.

articles.title: Nintendo Switch 2 Pro Controller Preorders Are Available Now
articles.author: Gamespot
articles.summary: Nintendo is launching a range of first-party accessories along with the Switch 2 on June 5. Among these accessories is a new Pro Controller, priced at $85 and available at Walmart, Target, and GameStop.

articles.title: As policymakers crack down on artificial ingredients and added sugars, Shiru launches commercial production of its AI-discovered ingredients
articles.summary: Shiru, an AI-powered ingredient discovery company, has commercially launched uPro™, a structured protein ingredient with texturizing and emulsifying properties, and OleoPro™, a protein-enabled fat alternative. These plant-based ingredients, made with GRAS ingredients, are available for commercial orders, offering manufacturers clean-label, sustainable solutions. Shiru's Flourish™ AI platform enabled the rapid discovery and development of these high-performance ingredients.

articles.title: Cleaning Gadgets You Probably Don't Need
articles.summary: A $1,400 robot vacuum cleaner is being tested, featuring AI obstacle detection, a self-emptying dirt bin, and a self-washing mop. The product also has a robot arm to clean corners, but it still faces similar limitations to other robot cleaners.

articles.title: From Cluj to Constanța – Wolt is Coming to Romania
articles.author: Aurel Dragan
articles.summary: Wolt is launching its app in Romania after acquiring Tazz. The Wolt app will offer a variety of services, including prepared meals, groceries, pharmacy products, and more, with features like fast delivery and easy payment options. Existing Tazz users will be able to migrate to the Wolt app.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy Z Flip 7 & Fold 7: Early Launch?
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: Samsung is expected to launch the Galaxy Z Flip 7 and Z Fold 7 at the beginning of the summer, potentially alongside the Galaxy Watch 8 and its first mixed reality headset. The company is also rumored to be exploring new foldable form factors with a possible Galaxy Z Flip FE and is speculated to release the Galaxy S25 Edge.

articles.title: How one family business found longevity by thinking ‘outside the box'
articles.author: Claude Solnik
articles.summary: New York Label & Box Works offers various packaging solutions for industries like cosmetics, health, food, and beverage. The company provides specialized packaging that meets stringent industry standards, including FDA-compliant secure packaging for the health and vitamin industries. Continuous investments in technology and process improvements enable them to expand product lines and services to meet evolving client needs.

articles.title: KFC: Fried chicken restaurant unveils the launch of ‘dirty' duo
articles.author: Food
articles.summary: KFC is re-launching the Dirty Louisiana Burger and launching the Dirty Loaded Fries. The Dirty Louisiana Burger, priced at £7.99, features the Original Recipe fillet with various toppings, while the Dirty Loaded Fries, priced at £3.99, consist of KFC's Signature Fries topped with Popcorn Chicken and sauces. These items will be available from April 28 to June 8 at KFC restaurants and online via delivery services.

articles.title: , the Pokémon Center in Japan just released
articles.author: Andrew Webster
articles.summary: Siliconera highlights new Pokémon merchandise, including a Bulbasaur planter, a Mimikyu mirror, and a garbage can featuring Trubbish. The merchandise consists of household goods.

articles.title: Samsung Looks to Make Interactive Ads Easier for Advertisers in New Offering
articles.author: Bill Bradley
articles.summary: Samsung Ads launched Creative Canvas, an advertising suite that enables marketers to create interactive ads and monitor results in real-time. The suite offers interactive ad formats, including QR-enabled ads and vertical video, and is currently available in the U.S. and Canada. This new offering targets small and medium businesses, providing a way to reach consumers through social media video assets.

articles.title: The new growth playbook: How leading companies are rewriting the rules of marketing in an AI-powered world
articles.author: Isaiah Steinfeld
articles.summary: Neue Alchemy launched a DTC product in under two weeks using automation, APIs, and GenAI for fulfillment, content ops, and marketing. This allowed them to validate how lean teams can quickly move from concept to market while maintaining craft and story. AWS built the infrastructure to power loops at scale.

articles.title: When the going gets tough, the political parties get soft
articles.author: Ted Rechtshaffen
articles.summary: Exascend's "Explorer Portable Solid State Drive" is reviewed. The review implicitly suggests the introduction of a new SSD product by Exascend.

articles.title: Verizon suffers major loss as customers switch gears
articles.author: Patricia Battle
articles.summary: Verizon announced in January that it was raising the monthly prices of its myPlan and New Verizon Plan wireless accounts. The company cited 'rising operational costs' as the reason for the price hikes.

articles.title: 'Absolutely fantastic' cordless vacuum 'better than Dyson' is £70 off
articles.author: Lea Dzifa Seeberg
articles.summary: SMOTURE Cordless Vacuum Cleaner is available on Amazon and eBay with a special price for Prime members. The vacuum features a cordless design, a one-hour battery life, LED touch screen, headlights, and a fragrance tablet. It is comparable to Dyson models based on customer reviews.

articles.title: Space NK's Everything Shower edit has nearly €200 worth of products for €81
articles.author: Michelle Townsend
articles.summary: Space NK has launched the Everything Shower Edit, a skincare and haircare kit inspired by a social media trend. The kit, priced at €81, contains products from brands like Sol de Janeiro, Aromatherapy Associates, and Living Proof, offering a spa-like experience at home.

articles.title: Aldi Ireland fans set to love major Dyson hair dryer dupe in middle aisle in days – and it's €300 cheaper
articles.author: Jamie Smith
articles.summary: ALDI Ireland is launching a "Premium Hair Dryer," a dupe of the Dyson Supersonic Origin Hair Dryer, for €39.99, featuring three temperature and two-speed settings. Additionally, ALDI is releasing crossbody bags, a dupe of Uniqlo's Round Mini Shoulder Bag, for €5.99 in various styles.

articles.title: Lakeland launches Spring Savings Event with reductions on steamers, cleaners and Ninja
articles.author: Nisha Mal
articles.summary: Lakeland has launched a Spring Savings Event, offering discounts on cleaning, laundry, and homeware devices. The sale includes the Turbo Scrubber Cordless Bathroom Cleaning Kit and AirCraft PowerGlide Cruise. Ninja's ZEROSTICK 20cm Saucepan and Gtech's AirRam Platinum Vacuum are also featured. Amazon is selling Russell Hobbs Steam and Clean Steam Mop.

articles.title: AI Agents Will Re-Imagine Creativity: Adobe's Govind Balakrishnan
articles.author: Manas Tiwari
org: Express Product Group & Digital Media Services
articles.summary: Adobe is integrating AI agents into its Express platform to assist with content creation, providing features like image generation and template suggestions. This update allows users to describe their desired content in natural language, with the AI agent generating design elements and a finished piece for further refinement. The integration aims to lower the barrier to entry for content creation by enabling anyone to translate their imagination onto a digital canvas.

articles.title: The perfect summer dress that can be worn to weddings from Marks and Spencer
articles.author: Bethany Gavaghan
articles.summary: Marks and Spencer has launched the Lyocell Rich Polka Dot Sweetheart Neckline Maxi Waisted Dress, priced at £79, as part of their spring collection. Nobody's Child offers the Black Polka Dot Anya Midi Dress at £150, with a 15% discount for new customers. River Island also offers the Cream Asymmetric Polka Dot Wrap Midi Dress for £46.

articles.title: Perfect summer dress that can be worn to weddings or on holiday at Marks and Spencer
articles.author: Bethany Gavaghan
articles.summary: Marks and Spencer has introduced the Lyocell Rich Polka Dot Sweetheart Neckline Maxi Waisted Dress, priced at £79, as part of its spring collection. The dress features a sweetheart neckline, a dropped waist, and is available in petite, regular, and tall lengths in sizes six to 24.

articles.title: Nintendo Switch 2 pre-orders are available now at Walmart, GameStop, Best Buy and others starting at $450
articles.author: Anna Washenko
articles.summary: Nintendo has opened pre-orders for the Nintendo Switch 2 console in North America, priced at $450, with a $500 Mario Kart World bundle also available. Retailers like GameStop, Walmart, Best Buy, and Target are participating in the pre-order launch, with GameStop offering both in-store and online options starting April 24th. Accessories for the Switch 2 are also available, with the new camera priced at $55.

articles.title: Nasdaq and AWS Unlock New Era of Growth for Global Capital Markets with Next Generation Infrastructure Solutions
articles.author: JOIN THE CONVERSATION
articles.summary: Nasdaq and AWS are collaborating on a modernization blueprint to integrate cloud benefits into local market infrastructures. As part of this, Nasdaq is launching Nasdaq Eqlipse, a suite of next-generation marketplace technology solutions delivering cloud-ready capabilities and data intelligence.

articles.title: Buried in Laundry? Poplin offers a solution for people's washing machine woes
articles.author: Karen Schaffner
articles.summary: Poplin, founded by Mort Fertel, launched a laundry service app that allows customers to outsource their laundry.  The service includes free pick-up and delivery, with laundry costing $1 per pound. Poplin aims to provide a convenient and high-quality laundry solution for its customers, addressing a common chore.

articles.title: Olymel promotes Canadian pork with launch of new delicious, convenient cuts Français
articles.author: Olymel l.p
articles.summary: Olymel has launched a new line of innovative pork products in Quebec grocery stores, designed with an upscale culinary experience including pork T-bone, chimichurri pork flank steak, and more. Simultaneously, Olymel is launching new fresh poultry products pre-seasoned with consumer-favourite marinades such as Mediterranean-style chicken breast, Teriyaki chicken thighs, and Shish taouk chicken breast skewers.

articles.title: Google Pixel 9a Smartphone Review
articles.author: Kurston Timothy
articles.summary: Google has launched the Pixel 9a smartphone, a more affordable alternative to the Pixel 9.  It features the Google Tensor G4 chipset, similar memory options, and a larger battery, while making some tradeoffs in camera and RAM. The Pixel 9a aims to offer a premium experience at a lower price point of $499 USD.

articles.title: Ninja multi-cooker slashed to under £100
articles.author: Meghan Coon
articles.summary: Ninja is offering the Foodi Mini 6-in-1 Multi-Cooker at a discounted price of £99 during its spring sale. The multi-cooker features six customizable cooking functions, including Pressure Cook, Air Fry, Slow Cook, Steam, Bake/Roast, and Sear/Saute, and has a 4.7l capacity. Ninja is including a free Deluxe Bake Kit with the Foodi Mini.

articles.title: Wolt to replace Tazz as food delivery giant enters Romanian market
articles.author: Romania Insider
articles.summary: Wolt is launching its local commerce platform in Romania this May, replacing the Tazz app. This rollout will cover 35 cities, starting with smaller areas and concluding in Bucharest by the end of the month. Existing Tazz users will transition to the Wolt app, retaining their data and preferences.

articles.title: Shoppers are ‘obsessed' with Primark's 90s throwback summer shoes – and you'll ever love them or hate them
articles.author: Senior Digital Writer
articles.summary: Primark has launched Jelly Ballerina Pumps, a 90s throwback shoe, available in bright blue and clear for £7. These slip-on jellies are part of Primark's nostalgia collection and are intended to add fun to summer outfits, with sizes ranging from UK size 3 to 8.

articles.title: CDNetworks Empowers Global Enterprises to Seamlessly Enter Emerging Markets with Ready-to-Market Solutions  Apr. 24, 2025 10:00
articles.summary: CDNetworks is reinforcing its commitment to supporting global enterprises expanding into emerging markets with a portfolio of web performance and security solutions. This includes cloud security, web & network performance, media delivery, and edge computing, all designed to ensure efficient content delivery, adaptive security defense, and optimized performance. The company provides full network coverage in emerging markets with over 2,800 CDN PoPs and over 40 scrubbing centers.

articles.title: Adobe releases ‘created without generative AI' tag to label human-generated art
articles.author: Mark Wilson
articles.summary: Adobe is introducing a new feature in Adobe Fresco, a drawing and painting app, that allows users to mark their work as 'created without generative AI'. This feature uses Adobe's Content Credentials standard to certify that the work was created by hand, providing a means for creators to distinguish their work from AI-generated content. Adobe is also integrating generative AI models by third parties, including OpenAI's ChatGPT and Google's Imagen and Veo, into its software suite.

articles.title: How to set up remote desktop access on your Linux computers
articles.author: Jack Wallen
articles.summary: NoMachine is introduced as a GUI application simplifying remote desktop access for Linux machines. The application streamlines the setup and connection process for remote machines, offering a user-friendly alternative to complex implementations like Xrdp. The article demonstrates the installation and usage on Ubuntu-based distributions.

articles.title: Motorola Razr 60 Ultra vs Samsung Galaxy Z Flip 6: Specs, features, and price compared
articles.author: Hindustan Times
articles.summary: Motorola is launching its new generation foldable smartphone, the Razr 60 Ultra, in global markets. This smartphone is anticipated to feature a significant performance upgrade and will compete with Samsung's Galaxy Z Flip 6.

articles.title: Givaudan Launches Guardians of Memories Game on Roblox in the U.S.
articles.author: Jennifer Weil
articles.summary: Givaudan launched its game, Guardians of Memories, on Roblox in the U.S., which aims to raise awareness of perfume creation among Gen Z and Alpha. This interactive and educational game allows players to experiment with perfume ingredients and composition.

articles.title: Salons in China offer ‘AI hair-washing' service
articles.author: Sammi Chan
articles.summary: Salons in southern China are introducing 'AI hair-washing' services to their customers. This represents a new service offering within the salon industry.

articles.title: Kansai Nerolac's new ad showcases next generation of innovation in painting services
articles.author: BE Staff
articles.summary: Kansai Nerolac Paints (KNPL) has launched NXTGEN, a new professional painting service, with a digital video commercial. NXTGEN features innovative solutions like a Colour Sensor using AI for color selection, aiming to provide a seamless and efficient painting process for homeowners.

articles.title: Samsung Electronics to hold Galaxy Unpacked event in July in New York: sources
articles.author: 김보람
articles.summary: Samsung Electronics is expected to hold its Galaxy Unpacked event in July in New York, where they will unveil the Galaxy Z Fold 7 and Galaxy Z Flip 7. This will be the first time in nearly three years that Samsung Electronics debuts its new Galaxy smartphones in New York.

articles.title: 'Versatile' Ninja Multi-cooker that 'saves time in kitchen' drops to under £100
articles.author: Meghan Coon
articles.summary: Ninja is offering the Foodi Mini 6-in-1 Multi-Cooker at a discounted price of £99, a 44% reduction from its original price of £179.99. The Foodi MAX 15-in-1 SmartLid Multi-Cooker is also on sale for £229.99, down from £319.99. The Foodi Mini Multi-Cooker features six cooking functions and TenderCrisp Technology, suitable for individuals and smaller households.

articles.title: The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild Nintendo Switch 2 Edition Is Now Up for Preorder
articles.author: Chris Reed
articles.summary: Nintendo is launching The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild - Nintendo Switch 2 Edition exclusively for the Nintendo Switch 2 on June 5. This edition includes the original game with Switch 2 enhancements and Zelda Notes. An upgrade pack is available separately for existing owners of the original game, and it is free with the Nintendo Switch Online Expansion Pack.

articles.title: Dubai's Mada Media launches single platform for all out-of-home advertising permits
articles.author: Staff Writer
articles.summary: Mada Media has launched a new consolidated online platform that centralizes advertising services for various sectors, including right of way, public transport, commercial vehicles, private land, and buildings. This platform aims to streamline advertising permit applications in Dubai, aligning with the company's goal to regulate the out-of-home advertising sector efficiently.

articles.title: MG Cyberster: New RWD drop-top EV adds more range for less cash
articles.author: James Wong
articles.summary: MG Motor Australia introduced a new entry-level version of its Cyberster electric roadster, the 2025 MG Cyberster 77kWh RWD, priced at $99,900. This variant features a single-motor rear-wheel drive setup, generating 250kW of power and 475Nm of torque, and achieving 0-100km/h in 5.2 seconds with a driving range of 552km. MG Motor also confirmed a new hardtop Cyberster GTS

articles.title: MG Cyber X SUV: Shanghai Motor Show Debut
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: MG introduced the Cyber X concept car at the Shanghai Auto Show, showcasing a rugged design intended to broaden the Cyber lineup and appeal to a wide audience, including the U.S. market. The Cyber X aims to offer versatility and adventure, potentially competing with vehicles like the Defender 90, while retaining MG's brand values in the electric vehicle sector.

articles.title: BYD previews electric Porsche 911 rival with Denza Z concept
articles.author: William Stopford
articles.summary: Denza, BYD's premium brand, has previewed its Z concept car, a four-seater electric vehicle featuring 'DiSus-M', an intelligent magnetorheological body control system, and 'China's first full-stack self-developed steer-by-wire system'. The car also includes a folding steering wheel designed to aid driver extrication in extreme crashes and boasts Lamborghini-inspired headlights and tail-lights.

articles.title: MG Cyberster: New RWD drop-top EV adds more range for less cash
articles.author: James Wong
articles.summary: MG Motor Australia has announced a new entry-level Cyberster 77kWh RWD electric roadster, priced at $99,900, featuring a single-motor rear-wheel drive setup and a 552km driving range. The company also confirmed a new hardtop Cyberster GTS, a production version of their previous concept car, with global market introduction expected in the coming months.

articles.title: Oppo A5 Pro launched in India for Rs 17,999: 50MP camera, Dimensity 6300, 5800mAh battery and more
articles.summary: Oppo has launched the Oppo A5 Pro, a budget 5G smartphone, in India. The device features a 120Hz display, a 50MP camera, and is designed for durability, starting at Rs 17,999. It is available for purchase through Amazon, Flipkart, Oppo's online store, and major retail outlets with launch offers like cashback and EMI plans.

articles.title: Innovation, design, and AI: MOVA Premium Technology Brand Debuts in Budapest
articles.author: Aurel Dragan
articles.summary: MOVA has launched a new range of smart home, personal care, and pet care products. Key products include intelligent robots and wet-dry vacuums with MopSwap™ technology, cordless stick vacuums, the Turbo hairdryer, and self-cleaning pet care solutions. The products were showcased at CES 2025 and at a launch event in Budapest.

articles.title: Samsung Electronics released a new Bespoke AI Hybrid Kitchen Fit Max refrigerator with a food showca..
articles.author: Park Sora
articles.summary: Samsung Electronics released the Bespoke AI Hybrid Kitchen Fit Max refrigerator on the 24th, featuring a food showcase door for the first time in the Kitchen Fit line. This new product incorporates AI technologies like AI Hybrid Cooling, Bixby voice control, AI Vision Inside, and AI Screen. The refrigerator is priced between 3.79 million and 4.49 million won, and Samsung Electronics will hold events for customers who purchase it in advance until June 30.

articles.title: Everything is under $20 at Amazon's new ‘Haul' storefront
articles.author: Best Reviews
articles.summary: Amazon introduced 'Haul,' a new storefront featuring items priced under $20.

articles.title: Nintendo Switch 2 Pre-Orders Are A Disaster
articles.author: Game Rant
articles.summary: Nintendo Switch 2 pre-orders are proving to be extremely difficult.

articles.title: The 5 Best Telegram Client Apps for Android
articles.author: Daily Excelsior
articles.summary: Several alternative Telegram clients are introduced, offering unique features. Nicegram emphasizes privacy and user-friendliness, Plus Messenger focuses on customization, Graph Messenger caters to tech enthusiasts with advanced functionalities, Telegram X prioritizes speed and efficiency, and Vidogram enhances multimedia capabilities. These clients provide users with varied Telegram experiences based on their needs.

articles.title: Four new Zelda amiibo are now available to pre-order
articles.author: Polygon
articles.summary: Nintendo is preparing to launch the Switch 2. To coincide with the launch, Nintendo will offer Switch 2 editions of Breath of the Wild and Tears of the Kingdom.

articles.title: All the Switch 2 accessories you can pre-order now
articles.author: Polygon
articles.summary: Nintendo will launch the Nintendo Switch 2 on June 5. A suite of new accessories will be released alongside the console. Many original Switch accessories will be compatible with the Switch 2.

articles.title: "Scaring Me With AI," Swiggy User Shares Bizarre Dragon Chicken Image Of Chennai Restaurant
articles.author: Jigyasa Kakwani
articles.summary: A Chennai restaurant is using AI to generate images for their 'Dragon Chicken' dish listed on Swiggy. The AI-generated image is intended to be a 'representative image' to attract customers, although it doesn't accurately reflect the actual appearance of the dish. This demonstrates a new use case of AI for enhancing food presentation on online platforms.

articles.title: Why Tech Founders Need To Get Medieval About Moat Building
articles.author: Check Warner MBE
articles.summary: Lovable and Bolt.new are tools used to create new products quickly. The babysitting app Bubble allows users to add friends and see which sitters they've used, adding a social referral component. Oura integrates hardware and software to provide personalized health insights.

articles.title: BYD previews electric Porsche 911 rival with Denza Z concept
articles.author: William Stopford
articles.summary: BYD's premium brand, Denza, has previewed a new electric sports car concept called the Z. This concept follows BYD's existing electric sports car, the Yangwang U9, signaling BYD's continued expansion in the electric vehicle market.

articles.title: BYD previews electric Porsche 911 rival with Denza Z concept
articles.author: William Stopford
articles.summary: BYD's premium brand, Denza, previewed the Denza Z concept car, a four-seater electric vehicle that appears production-ready. The Denza Z features DiSus-M, an intelligent magnetorheological body control system, and a self-developed steer-by-wire system. Denza is planning a local launch in 2025 and may introduce models like the Bao 5 and Denza B5.

articles.title: BYD previews electric Porsche 911 rival with Denza Z concept
articles.author: William Stopford
articles.summary: Denza is planning a local launch of its models in 2025. The Bao 5 off-roader from Fangchengbao (another BYD brand) is being considered, and the Denza B5 name has been confirmed for other markets.

articles.title: 剛剛，OpenAI最強圖像生成API上線，一張圖1毛5
articles.author: 新浪網
articles.summary: OpenAI has launched its new native multimodal image generation model API, gpt-image-1, which allows for customized output image quality, size, and format. The API is open to all developers and integrated image generation, image editing, and image variation features.  Companies like Adobe, Figma, HeyGen, Photoroom, Canva, GoDaddy, HubSpot, Instacart, and InVideo are already integrating gpt-image-1 into their products and services.

articles.title: 5 One UI 7 features that make me stop missing my iPhone
articles.author: Pocket Lint
articles.summary: One UI 7 introduces new features. These features are notable enough to be 'worth the wait', suggesting significant updates or improvements.

articles.title: The Kindle Colorsoft just dropped to its lowest price ever
articles.author: Pocket Lint
articles.summary: Amazon has launched the Kindle Colorsoft, its first color e-reader, and it is currently available for purchase.

articles.title: LG's new emotionally reactive AI ad tech is a Black Mirror episode come to life
articles.author: Pocket Lint
articles.summary: LG will add Large Emotion Model technology to its webOS TVs. This addition will enable AI-powered targeted advertising.

articles.title: The State News Crossword, April 24, 2025
articles.summary: StateNews.com is introducing a new version of their website. Users can now test drive the NEW StateNews.com.

articles.title: 40 Years Ago, Coca-Cola Made The Biggest Mistake In Soda History
articles.author: Lauren Bair
articles.summary: Coca-Cola launched New Coke in 1985, a reformulated, sweeter version of its classic soda, but faced significant backlash.  The company also introduced Tab Clear in 1992 to compete with Crystal Pepsi. More recently, Coca-Cola launched Coca-Cola Starlight, Coca-Cola Spiced, and Coca-Cola Orange Cream, with varying degrees of consumer acceptance.

articles.title: Furniture China 2025：BEYOND NEXT、浦東で始動
articles.author: お笑い芸人
articles.summary: A company launched a new web-based service for businesses to select and apply photos. Customers can now choose and apply for photos directly through the website. Support is available for those who cannot find suitable photos.

articles.title: CDNetworks Empowers Global Enterprises to Seamlessly Enter Emerging Markets with Ready-to-Market Solutions
articles.author: PR Newswire Asia
articles.summary: CDNetworks is offering web performance, media delivery, cloud security, zero trust security, and colocation services aimed at supporting global enterprises expanding into emerging markets. CDNetworks provides network coverage with CDN PoPs and scrubbing centers across 70 countries. CDNetworks also offers technical assistance, ISP partnerships and solutions for security and acceleration.

articles.title: Kioxia's Portable SSD Wins Red Dot Design Award for Product Design 2025
articles.author: Joplin Globe
articles.summary: Kioxia Corporation's EXCERIA PLUS G2 Portable SSD Series received the Red Dot Design Award in the 'Product Design 2025' category. The Red Dot Design Award ceremony will honor the winners on July 8th in Essen, Germany.

articles.title: BYD's luxury off-road range-extender EV gets stretched
articles.author: James Wong
articles.summary: BYD's luxury subsidiary, Yangwang, unveiled the U8L extended wheelbase luxury 4WD at the Shanghai motor show. This new vehicle is designed to compete with long-wheelbase versions of luxury SUVs like the Range Rover and Bentley Bentayga.

articles.title: BYD's luxury off-road range-extender EV gets stretched
articles.author: James Wong
articles.summary: BYD's luxury subsidiary, Yangwang, introduced the U8L extended wheelbase luxury 4WD at the Shanghai motor show. The U8L is designed to compete with long-wheelbase versions of luxury SUVs like the Range Rover and Bentley Bentayga.

articles.title: Meghan Trainor Uses These Arm & Hammer Laundry Sheets
articles.author: Savannah Born
articles.summary: Arm & Hammer has introduced Power Sheets, a new laundry detergent in sheet form. These bleach-free sheets offer a convenient and eco-friendly alternative to liquid detergents, effectively cleaning, tackling stains, and removing odors. They are available on Amazon and have received positive reviews.

articles.title: Scouted: The Best Discreet Vibrators (for Sex Toy Newbies and Experts Alike)
articles.summary: Bellesa introduced the Whisper Bullet Vibrator, a quiet device. Dame launched the Pom Vibrator, a flexible palm-sized vibe. Lovehoney offers the Rose Clitoral Suction Stimulator. Desire Luxury markets the 20 Function Vibrating Male Stroker. Unbound Babes sells the Flick Ring Vibrator, a wearable device.

articles.title: Samsung Electronics to hold Galaxy Unpacked event in July in New York: sources
articles.author: Kim Boram
articles.summary: Samsung Electronics is expected to unveil the Galaxy Z Fold 7 and Galaxy Z Flip 7 at its Galaxy Unpacked event in July in New York. This marks the first time in nearly three years that Samsung Electronics will debut its new Galaxy smartphones in New York.

articles.title: Kioxia Portable SSD Clinches 2025 Red Dot Design Award
articles.author: Mirage News
articles.summary: Kioxia Corporation's EXCERIA PLUS G2 Portable SSD Series received the Red Dot Design Award in the "Product Design 2025" category. The EXCERIA PLUS G2 portable SSD Series was selected for its sleek design, user-centric functionality and durable build.

articles.title: I Demoed Adobe's Coolest New AI and Creative Tools. Here Are My Top Five Favorites
articles.author: CNET
articles.summary: Adobe introduces new features for Firefly and Photoshop. Users are encouraged to explore these updated functionalities.

articles.title: On Motorola's new Razr phones, Google shares the spotlight with Perplexity, Meta and Microsoft
articles.author: Lisa Eadicicco
articles.summary: Motorola launched new Razr flip phones incorporating artificial intelligence features powered by its own AI technology as well as technology from Perplexity, Meta, Microsoft and Google. These new features mark a significant advancement in smartphone technology.

articles.title: OnePlus 13T compact flagship phone with Snapdragon 8 Elite, 6260mAh battery launched: Details inside
articles.author: India Today
articles.summary: OnePlus launched the OnePlus T, a compact flagship phone. This new phone includes features like Snapdragon Elite processor and a mAh battery.

articles.title: Nintendo Issues Warning About Release Date Delivery for Switch 2
articles.author: Game Rant
articles.summary: Nintendo has started pre-orders for the Nintendo Switch 2, which is slated for release on June 5. However, Nintendo warns that some customers may experience delivery delays for the new console.

articles.title: Motorola Razr 60 vs Motorola Razr 50: Here's everything new expected
articles.author: Live Mint
articles.summary: Motorola is launching the Razr 60 today. The Razr 60 features a new processor and upgrades compared to the Razr 50.

articles.title: Mercedes to launch by-wire steering and yoke wheel in 2026
articles.author: Yahoo Daily News
articles.summary: The updated EQS electric saloon is anticipated to be the debut model featuring the firm's latest technology. This suggests a product update or launch with innovative features.

articles.title: Nintendo Switch 2 Edition upgrade prices for Kirby and Mario Party cost more than Zelda
articles.author: Eurogamer
articles.summary: Nintendo has revealed the pricing for the Nintendo Switch 2 Edition upgrades for games, including The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild. The upgrade pricing won't be uniform across all games.

articles.title: Welcome to Wonderlight, where innovation ignites imagination! (Clay Paky SpA)
articles.author: Public Technologies
articles.summary: The article lists related products for the year 2025, including Tambora Flash, Tambora Stormy, Tambora Rays, and Tambora Stormy Linear. More information is available by clicking the provided link.

articles.title: Beyond The Hype: Mastering The Art Of The High-Impact Sales Kickoff
articles.author: Anjai Lal
articles.summary: The article discusses the importance of sales kickoffs and mentions 'Strategic Solution Selling' breakouts, which combine deep-dives on new key products with role-playing to articulate value and handle objections.  This training equips the sales team with competencies needed to execute the plan and promote new products.

articles.title: How to pre-order the Nintendo Switch 2
articles.author: Polygon
articles.summary: Nintendo is launching its next-generation console, the Nintendo Switch 2, with pre-orders now open in the U.S. through various retailers, including Walmart, Best Buy, GameStop, Target, and Nintendo. The console will be available starting June 5 at a price of $449.99.

articles.title: Nintendo Switch 2 preorders are live: Where can you buy one?
articles.author: BGR
articles.summary: Nintendo Switch 2 preorders are now available in the US after a slight delay due to tariffs. The Nintendo Switch 2 is still scheduled to launch on June 5th for $449.99.

articles.title: One of the TMNT Skins in Fortnite Has a Secret Style
articles.author: Game Rant
articles.summary: Epic Games' Fortnite introduced Krang's Android, a Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles skin, to the Item Shop following update v34.40. The skin includes a secret variant, available to a select group of players.

articles.title: Vingcard launches its Vingcard NovelTubular Deadbolt solution
articles.author: Travel Daily News
articles.summary: Vingcard, an ASSA ABLOY company, launched the Vingcard Novel Tubular Deadbolt solution. This new product offers a modern and robust design suitable for both retrofitting and new installations, addressing the need for updated door lock security in the hospitality industry.
